parties: Nalaka Chaminda Jayaweera Vs Sri Lanka Institute of Architects and others
keywords: - Restriction on use of title “Architect” under Sri Lanka Institute of   Architects Law. - Investigation of complaints prior to award of membership in the Sri   Lanka Institute of Architects.  - Procedure and time limit of making complaints to Sri Lanka Institute  of Architects. - Procedure for disciplinary inquiries against a member of the Sri   Lanka Institute of Architects. - Difference between Appeals and Judicial Review
